entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING, Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 a.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
